name: Ziplex Sneakers - Men's
category_hierarchy: Footwear/Men/Casual Shoes & Urban Boots/Casual Shoes & Sneakers

features: Crafted from smooth YAK leather and tear-resistant CORDURA®
Sporty neoprene sock lining and asymmetric lacing
Lace-up front provides a secure, easy-to-adjust fit
Anatomically designed footbed offers stability and protection
ECCO SHOCK THRU Technology for shock absorption with every step
A fluid, one-piece, zip inspired sole for bendability and flexibility with added rubber inserts for grip
